name: A Summer Afternoon
description:
In the future machines adopt human's morality and sympathies as their programming. Human brains will process this artificial emotions and this is one of the reasons for the rise of machines taking human's jobs. This transition will happen very fast, perhaps as soon as 20 years.

If machines learn to have emotions, what will they do with them? Will they realize how to really feel for the people.


Part of MoMO (Museum Of Modern Objkt) 2021. @boreuno
